Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/Base-Tea.content:
The Garden Gate Blend
Sylvian Whimsey

Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/Ingredie.title: Lemon Zest
Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/Ingredie.content:
üîÆ Lemon Zest
Brightening the Body, Clearing the Mind, Sharpening the Spell

üçã Overview
Lemon zest‚Äîthe outermost skin of the fruit‚Äîis the fire of the citrus world. Where the juice is watery and emotional, the zest is solar, airy, and sharp. It carries essential oils, bursts with scent, and holds the essence of clarity and purification.

üåø Uses in the Physical


Culinary: Often used to brighten teas, syrups, and baked goods. Combines well with honey, Mint, rosemary, and black tea.


Health Benefits: High in antioxidants and limonene, said to aid in digestion and liver detox.


Tea Blend Pairings:


Lemon Zest + Green Tea: clarity and energy


Lemon Zest + Lavender: calm alertness


Lemon Zest + Ginger: solar fire for cold mornings





üßô Magical Properties


Element: Air / Fire


Planetary Alignment: Sun


Intentions: Clarity, joy, purification, brightness, energy


Ritual Uses:


Add to incense or simmer pots for banishing gloom or clearing mental fog


Use in bath blends for purification before major decisions


Include in prosperity blends for creative enterprises or mental clarity in business





üìö Related Concepts


Solar Herbs


Prosperity Magic


Citrus Magic


New Moon Clarity Blends


Tea Ingredients Index



üìù Journal Prompts


What in my life needs a burst of brightness?


Where have I dulled my own edges in the name of comfort?


What thoughts need clearing to make way for new light?



üß™ Experiments & Recipes


Prosperity Zest Syrup ‚Äì Lemon zest + ginger + honey


Clarity Tea ‚Äì Green tea, lemon zest, peppermint


Solar Salt ‚Äì Lemon zest, dried thyme, sea salt (for spellwork or seasoning)



üí≠ Notes and Observations
‚ÄúThe first time I added zest to a mug of rosemary tea, it was like I‚Äôd unlocked the ‚Äòon‚Äô switch in my brain.‚Äù
‚ÄúSeems to wake up not just the senses, but the self.‚Äù

Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/Sylvian-.title: Sylvian Whimsey
Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/Sylvian-.content:
A Green Tea that is blended with the intention of mischief and playful energy

Base
Using a Hyson tea as a basewhich has a strong, and slightly smoky flavor profile for a green tea
Additions
Spearmint - Uplifting, cool, and energizing
Lemongrass - Bright, citrusy, brings clarity and cheer (unless you are a cat I guess)
Rosemary - Mental sharpness, protection, a hint of wild edge
Elderflower or Apple pieces - sweetness, maybe a little of playful fae-energy.
Flavor Profile
Clean, crisp, slightly herbal with a fresh breeze of mint and lemon. Think forest laughter and daring shadows.
Magical Uses
Perfect for study, spell prep, fae offerings, or when you need to focus with a little twist of fun. Ideal for springtime, Air magic, or Mercury workings.

Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/The-Gard.filePath: Raven's Kitchen/Hearthfire Teas/The Garden Gate Blend.md
Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/The-Gard.title: The Garden Gate Blend
Raven's-Kitchen/Hearthfire-Teas/The-Gard.content:
greentea focus


Some people really like or really dislike green tea. I‚Äôm decidedly in the first camp and have been a superfan of green tea for as long as I can remember. With this cup, I chose it as my base, using it‚Äôs anti-oxidant and light citrus flavor profile to help promote a sense of focus and awareness.
A Refreshing Sense of Focus in Bone China
Base
A Sencha or Gunpowder Green Tea serves as a delightful based for this blend, having great anti-oxident properties to pick up both body and spirit.
Additions
To enhance your cup

Dried Strawberry or Raspberry Leaf
Peppermint
Lemon Verbena or Lemon Zest

Magical Properties
It opens the mind, invites abundance, and supports focus for spell-craft or studying.

Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Archegen.title: Archegennetikon
Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Archegen.content:
Archegennetikon: The Primordial Deities
Before the Titans. Before the Olympians. There were the first echoes ‚Äî chaos, void, night, time. The Archegennetikon catalogs the origins of being, force, and fate.
üåå The First Principles

Chaos ‚Äì The Yawning Void
Nyx ‚Äì Night Incarnate
Erebus ‚Äì Deep Shadow
Aether ‚Äì Upper Sky
Hemera ‚Äì Daylight
Chronos ‚Äì Time and Inevitability
Ananke ‚Äì Necessity and Compulsion
Phanes ‚Äì Progenitor of Life

üåä Cosmic Beings

Gaia ‚Äì Earth
Uranus ‚Äì Sky
Pontus ‚Äì Deep Sea
Thalassa ‚Äì Sea Surface
Ourea ‚Äì The Mountains
Tartarus ‚Äì The Pit
Eros ‚Äì First Desire


üåÄ Related Material

Cosmogony Myths Index
Titanologion
Chthonomikon
Symbols_and_Signs
Ritual_List
index


‚ÄúFrom void, came form. From form, fate. From fate‚Ä¶ everything.‚Äù

Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Chthonom.title: Chthonomikon
Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Chthonom.content:
Chthonomikon: The Powers Below
This is the record of the below. The nameless road, the endless hall, the asphodel fields. The Chthonomikon honors those who dwell in the deep: rulers, judges, and shadows who know the truths of death.
üïØÔ∏è Lords and Powers of the Underworld

Hades ‚Äì King Below, Keeper of Oaths
Persephone ‚Äì Queen of Cycles
Hekate ‚Äì Torchbearer, Witch-Mother
Thanatos ‚Äì Gentle Death
Hypnos ‚Äì Sleep
Morpheus ‚Äì Shaper of Dreams
Melino√´ ‚Äì Madness and Ghosts
Macaria ‚Äì Blessed Death
Erebus ‚Äì Deep Darkness
Nyx ‚Äì Night (also Primordial)
Charon ‚Äì Ferryman
Cerberus ‚Äì Guardian of the Gate

‚öñÔ∏è Judges and Fates

Minos ‚Äì Judge of the Dead
Rhadamanthus ‚Äì Lawgiver
Aeacus ‚Äì Guardian of the Keys
Moirai ‚Äì The Fates (Clotho, Lachesis, Atropos)


‚ö∞Ô∏è Related Material

Rituals for the Dead
Necromancy & Oracles Index
Chthonic Offerings Log
Symbols_and_Signs
Archegennetikon
index


‚ÄúAll must pass through the gate. Not all return.‚Äù

Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Chthonom.title: Persephone
Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Chthonom.content:
Persephone
Name & Epithets
What names, titles, and roles is this deity known by? Include cultural, poetic, and magical epithets.
Domain & Associations
List and describe the areas this deity governs or embodies. Include symbols, colors, animals, planetary and elemental ties.
Mythic Overview
Summarize the major myths and stories surrounding this deity. Keep the tone lyrical or evocative. Focus especially on transformation, descent, taboo, and power dynamics.
Historical Notes
Where were they worshipped? What rituals, artifacts, or epigraphs are tied to them? Add references to syncretic or regional forms.
Devotional Tone
Describe how this deity tends to ‚Äúfeel‚Äù in spiritual or psychic encounters. What patterns, moods, or omens are associated with their presence?
Key Offerings

What items, acts, or devotions are appropriate?
What might be disrespectful or unwanted?
Include suggested offering bundles or thematic sets.

Materials:
Steps:
1.
2.
3.
4.
Optional timing: [e.g., New moon, Winter Solstice, Personal anniversaries]
Altar Aesthetics
Describe the visual style, textures, tools, and colors that suit this deity‚Äôs altar. Add bindrune/sigil placeholder if relevant.
Daily Practices
Simple devotions, actions, mantras, or journaling prompts for working with this deity regularly.
Invocations & Prayers
Write 1‚Äì2 prayers, invocations, or poetic call-ins. Can be structured for solo or group use.
UPG & Field Notes
Share your own experiences, symbols, dreams, or emotions related to this deity. Mark clearly as personal gnosis if not historically verified.
Backlinks & Crossroads
Link to:

Related deities
Ritual logs
Seasonal or lunar rites
Archetype maps
Any MOCs or thematic clusters

References & Sources

[Link] ‚Äì Blog or website with commentary, art, or devotional content

Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Olympony.title: Olymponymaicon
Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Olympony.content:
The Twelve Olympians
Welcome to the Olymponymaicon ‚Äî your hub for the twelve major deities of the Greek pantheon. Each link below leads to a full entry detailing their myths, symbols, epithets, rituals, and devotional practices.
üî± The Olympian Pantheon
Major Deities

Zeus ‚Äì King of the Gods
Hera ‚Äì Queen of Olympus
Poseidon ‚Äì Lord of the Sea
Demeter ‚Äì Earth Mother and Grain Bearer
Athena ‚Äì Strategist and Weaver
Apollo ‚Äì Light, Music, Prophecy
Artemis ‚Äì Huntress of the Wilds
Ares ‚Äì God of War and Fury
Hephaestus ‚Äì Forge and Flame
Aphrodite ‚Äì Beauty and Desire
Hermes ‚Äì Messenger and Psychopomp
Dionysus ‚Äì Ecstasy and Vine


Alternate traditions may substitute Hestia ‚Äì Hearth and Harmony for Dionysus in earlier lists. Both may be honored as Olympians depending on your path.


üìú Related Topics

Olympian Epithets
Offerings_Log
Symbols_and_Signs
Ritual_List
index


‚ÄúTo Mount Olympus we turn our gaze, where immortals dwell and stories blaze.‚Äù

Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Titanolo.title: Titanologion
Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Hellenes/Titanolo.content:
The Titanologion
The ancient powers before Olympus ‚Äî the primordial architects, sky-binders, and star-eaters. This is your hub for exploring the lore, lineage, and legacy of the Titans.
üåå The Elder Titans
First Generation

Uranus ‚Äì Sky Father
Gaia ‚Äì Earth Mother
Oceanus ‚Äì The Endless River
Coeus ‚Äì Inquiry and Intellect
Crius ‚Äì Constellation-Binder
Hyperion ‚Äì Light of the East
Iapetus ‚Äì Mortality and Craft

Second Generation (Children of Titans)

Cronus ‚Äì Time and Tyranny
Rhea ‚Äì Great Mother
Themis ‚Äì Order and Law
Mnemosyne ‚Äì Memory and Muse Mother
Tethys ‚Äì Freshwater Mother
Phoebe ‚Äì Radiant Intellect
Atlas ‚Äì Bearer of the Heavens
Prometheus ‚Äì Fire-Bringer
Epimetheus ‚Äì Hindsight and Regret
Leto ‚Äì Mother of Light Twins (Apollo & Artemis)

Myths of the Titanomachy

Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Per-Neter/Per-Net.title: Per-Neter
Rook's-Forge/Codex-Dei/Per-Neter/Per-Net.content:
Per-Neter: The Egyptian Pantheon
Enter the sacred precinct of the Neteru ‚Äî divine principles in flesh and form. This map guides you through the core deities of the Kemetian tradition.
üåû Ennead of Heliopolis (Primary Nine)

Atum ‚Äì The Self-Created One
Shu ‚Äì Air and Separation
Tefnut ‚Äì Moisture and Balance
Geb ‚Äì Earth Father
Nut ‚Äì Starry Sky Mother
Osiris ‚Äì Lord of the Afterlife
Isis ‚Äì Queen of Magic
Set ‚Äì Chaos and Storms
Nephthys ‚Äì Mourner and Veil Keeper

üêæ Other Major Neteru

Ra ‚Äì Solar Creator
Amun ‚Äì Hidden Force
Horus ‚Äì Sky King and Avenger
Anubis ‚Äì Opener of the Ways
Thoth ‚Äì Scribe of the Gods
Hathor ‚Äì Joy and Music
Sekhmet ‚Äì Flame of the Sun
Bast ‚Äì Cat and Perfume
Ptah ‚Äì Craftsman of Creation
Ma‚Äôat ‚Äì Truth and Cosmic Order

The-Challenger-Bazaar/Rook's-Deck-Worksh.filePath: The Challenger Bazaar/Rook's Deck Workshop/Decks/Jeskai Ascendant.md
The-Challenger-Bazaar/Rook's-Deck-Worksh.title: Jeskai Ascendant
The-Challenger-Bazaar/Rook's-Deck-Worksh.content:
Jeskai Ascendant ‚Äì Zinnia Deck Index

A Zinnia-led commander deck focused on explosive token production, spell synergy, and modular finishers via infect or anthem-heavy gods.

üß¨ Core Commander

Zinnia, Valley‚Äôs Voice

üõ°Ô∏è Main Deck Links
Creatures


Monastery Mentor

üß© Optional Sideboard Modules
Infect Kill Package


Blighted Agent ‚Äì Unblockable infect

The-Challenger-Bazaar/Rook's-Deck-Worksh.filePath: The Challenger Bazaar/Rook's Deck Workshop/Rook's Decks.md
The-Challenger-Bazaar/Rook's-Deck-Worksh.title: Rook's Decks
The-Challenger-Bazaar/Rook's-Deck-Worksh.content:
Jeskai Ascendant


Commander: Zinnia, Valley‚Äôs Voice


Strategy: Token swarm, spell synergy, prowess buff lines, with modular kill options.


Finishers: Mass tokens + anthem, Shu Yun double strike, Infect package


Current Power Level: Tier 4 ‚Äî Optimized (Low)


Sideboard Modules:


Infect Kill Package


Ascendant Mythic Package




Last Updated: 2025-05-27



üîß Notes


Tier 4 includes tuned synergy and known interactions, but no infinite loops, tutors, or dedicated lockdowns.


This deck thrives on interaction density and value-per-spell over brute force or combo.



Mardu Surge ‚Äî Tarkir: Dragonstorm

A preconstructed Commander deck from the Tarkir: Dragonstorm product, representing the Mardu wedge (Red/White/Black). Built around aggressive token strategies, sacrifice synergies, and classic Mardu tempo pressure.

üî• Core Identity


Colors: Mardu (R/W/B)


Product Origin: Tarkir: Dragonstorm Commander Precon


Power Level: Precon Vanilla (Unmodified)


Themes:


Go-wide tokens


Sacrifice for value


Hasty attacks and death triggers




üßô Commanders (Face & Alternate)


Face Commander: Zurgo, Stormrender


Backup Commander: Neriv, the Firestorm (Spirit Dragon)


üì¶ Contents

100 cards straight from the box. No modifications yet. Includes:



Dragons


Goblin tokens


Instant-speed removal


Mardu Ascendancy


üß© Upgrade Paths (future fork options)


Mardu Aristocrats ‚Äî Focus on sacrifice loops and Blood Artist effects


Mardu Tokens Refit ‚Äî Enhance the go-wide and haste payoff strategy


Dragons of War ‚Äî Lean into big fliers and tribal synergies



üìÖ Notes
This deck currently serves as a baseline for benchmarking upgrades and testing synergy packages like Ascendancies, modular combos, and fast aggro pressure.
Would you like a full MoC and breakdown for every included card, or keep this vanilla for now?

index.title: Hearth & Rook
index.content:
Welcome to the Hearth

Sigils, spirits, and Appalachian smoke‚Äîthis is where stories spark and rootwork rises.

We are a digital grimoire of bindrunes, spellwork, teas, and tools‚Äîsteeped in folklore, grounded in praxis.

ü™∂ Start Your Journey

üïØ [Enter the Codex Dei](../Rook‚Äôs Forge/Codex Dei/Index)
üçµ [Visit Raven‚Äôs Kitchen](../Raven‚Äôs Kitchen/index)
üîÆ Explore Ritual Templates
‚úçÔ∏è [Read the Zine](../Rook‚Äôs Forge/Rook‚Äôs Deity Zine/Hellenes/Olymponymaicon)


üî• Latest Additions
Sylvian Whimsey Tea
A seasonal blend for dreamwork and night wards. Bright mint, lemon zest, and a pinch of forest.
Chthonomikon
A descent into the mysteries of the Chthonic‚Äîrituals, deities, and crossroads practice.

üß≠ What is Hearth & Rook?
We‚Äôre a collaborative lore forge blending code, craft, and cultural memory.
Think of it like a southern Gothic library run by a kitchen witch and a chaos engineer.

üõ† Want to Help?
We‚Äôre always brewing more‚Äîcontact us or support on Ko-Fi.
